title: Trail Of Tears National Historic Trail: Original Route Begin
body: Original Route BEGIN Sign          As discussed for the Original Route NEXT XX MILES sign, this original route sign is used to identify the beginning point of a segment of road to be signed as an original route. See the description of Original Route NEXT XX MILES for consideration of use.  Â    Other Sign Web Pages: Auto Tour Route Local Tour Route Crossing To Original Route Original Route Original Route Next XX Miles Original Route END Historic Site Name Site Identification - Entrance
